summary: Knowledge in cyber kill chain, vulnerability management; skilled in Python, Java
Experienced in maintainig self-hosted cloud infrastructure
Native mandarin speaker, fluent in English

experience.subtitle: Zhejiang University NGICS Platform
content: A research oriented role at Zhejiang University NGICS Platform under the College of Control Science and Engineering.
Investigating the behaviors behind mainstream DCS and PLC with the aid of Protocol Analysis and Reverse Engineering
From security perspective, discover potential attacks which can cause harm to the system.
Build real-case scenario to demostrate attacks in order to raise awareness.

experience.subtitle: Alibaba
content: Participated in the development of the simulation lottery system based on Java.
Conducted system function design and development
Engaged in the design and development of system function modules, drew activity diagrams, database ER diagrams, system architecture diagram, etc.

experience.subtitle: Wuhan ZHaolaobao Network Technology Co., Ltd
content: Using SpringMVC to interact with MySQL database for CRUD operations

education.subtitle: Bachelor of Computer Science
content: Active member of RMIT Information Security Collective club and RMIT Ultimate Frisbee Club
Attended CySCA 2018 and played Ultimate Frisbee National Uni Game 2018 for RMIT.
